home.title: Creative Developer
home.description: I create solutions that solve real-world problems using cutting-edge technologies. For me, programming is not just about writing code, but the art of creating tools that are useful to people.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Thoughts on technology, design, and building better digital experiences.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: A collection of projects that showcase my passion for creating exceptional digital experiences.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a programmer passionate about developing digital products based on advanced technologies and sustainable solutions. For me, every project is a new opportunity and a new approach. My goal is to write code not just to work, but to work efficiently, be easily scalable, and be user-friendly.
about.journey_description1: Begun learning web development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Built my first websites and discovered my passion for creating digital experiences.
about.journey_description2: Dove deep into modern web technologies, mastering React, Node.js, and various databases. Started working on more complex full-stack applications.
about.journey_description3: Started working on more complex full-stack applications.
about.work_together_description: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities and interesting projects. Let's create something amazing together!

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind or just want to chat? I'd love to hear from you. Let's discuss how we can bring your ideas to life.
contact.for_work_description: I'm currently available for freelance projects and full-time opportunities. Let's discuss your next project!
contact.subject: Subject
